metadata.name: Complete HR Automation Implementation (4-Week Plan)
metadata.description: End-to-end implementation of HR automation system based on comprehensive YouTube tutorial research. Automates CV screening, recruitment pipeline, interview scheduling, job posting, onboarding, and compliance tracking. Designed for small HR teams (2-5 people) in Austria/Ukraine with GDPR compliance requirements. Achieves 20-30 hours/month time savings and €350+/month cost reduction vs traditional HR tools.
metadata.roi_estimate: 20-30 hours/month time savings, €350+/month cost reduction vs traditional ATS (€2,000-5,000/month). ROI breakeven: First recruitment cycle (Month 1). Annual value: €4,200-6,000 in saved labor costs.
success_criteria: CV screening automated: Process 50 CVs in 90 minutes vs 20+ hours manually (18.5 hour savings)
Recruitment cycle time reduced: 30 days → 20 days average
Job posting creation time: 1 hour → 30 minutes (AI-assisted)
Onboarding admin time: 3-5 hours → 30 minutes per new hire
Compliance monitoring automated with flagging and alerts
Team fully trained and documentation complete
All workflows operational and tested
Measured time savings of 20-30 hours/month achieved
prerequisites: HR team buy-in and commitment (minimum 2 team members: Viktoriia - technical, Evgeniya - process)
Google Workspace access with admin privileges
Time allocation: 4 weeks × 8-10 hours/week = 32-40 hours total team investment
Management approval for AI-assisted hiring processes
best_for: Small HR teams (2-5 people) in Austria/Ukraine or other EU countries
Companies processing 50+ CVs per recruitment cycle
Organizations wanting to reduce manual HR administrative work by 70%+
Teams with GDPR/EU data compliance requirements
Startups and scale-ups with growing hiring needs but limited HR headcount
Remote-first companies needing automated, async-friendly processes
not_recommended_for: Enterprise companies with >1,000 employees (need enterprise ATS)
Organizations with budget for full-featured HRIS (Workday, SAP, BambooHR)
Companies with complex compliance needs beyond GDPR (highly regulated industries)
Teams unwilling to invest time in setup and maintenance
Organizations without technical team member for workflow troubleshooting

phases.phase_description: Automate core CV screening and candidate ranking using n8n automation platform with Google Gemini AI. Establish foundation for automated recruitment pipeline. This is the highest-ROI phase delivering immediate 18.5 hour time savings per 50 CVs processed.
phases.output: Operational automated CV screening system processing CVs from Gmail, analyzing with AI, outputting to Google Sheets with scores and recommendations
success_criteria: n8n workflow operational with all nodes configured
Gmail trigger reliably fires on new CV emails
Gemini AI analysis produces valid 21-field TSV output with >90% accuracy
Google Sheets receives and displays candidate data properly formatted
Test batch: 50 CVs processed in 90 minutes vs 20+ hours manually
CV screening accuracy validated: >90% agreement with manual HR review
Error handling configured with email alerts to HR team
Documentation created: workflow setup guide and usage instructions
key_activities: Setup n8n Cloud account with EU datacenter (GDPR compliance)
Connect Gmail, obtain Gemini API key, create Google Sheets template
Build n8n workflow nodes: Gmail → Extract CV → AI Analysis → Sheets Output
Configure Gemini AI with CV Parser v1 prompt for 21-field extraction
Optimize AI parameters (temperature, tokens) for consistency
Test with diverse CV samples, calibrate scoring against manual review
Implement bias testing and mitigation
Document workflow and train team

team_allocation.Viktoriia_technical: 6-7 hours (n8n setup, API configuration, workflow building, testing)
team_allocation.Evgeniya_process: 2-3 hours (CV samples preparation, accuracy validation, documentation)

risks.risk: Gemini API rate limits exceeded during testing
risks.mitigation: Use free tier conservatively, add delays between requests, plan for paid tier if needed
Prompt engineering iterations, use few-shot examples, fallback to manual review for low-confidence scores
Use dedicated recruitment inbox, test trigger thoroughly, implement polling backup

phases.phase_description: Build end-to-end recruitment tracking system using Notion as ATS, integrate Typeform for applications, automate interview scheduling, and initiate onboarding automation design. Creates unified candidate pipeline from application to hire.
phases.output: Complete recruitment tracking system: Typeform applications → Notion ATS → Interview scheduling → Onboarding handoff. All candidate data centralized with status tracking and team collaboration.
success_criteria: Notion ATS database created with all 35+ fields and 7+ views
Typeform application form professional, mobile-friendly, collecting all required data
n8n integration: Typeform → Notion working (applications auto-create candidate cards)
CV screening workflow connected to Notion (Gmail CVs also create/update Notion entries)
Interview scheduling automation operational (Google Calendar or Calendly)
Test candidate processed end-to-end: application → CV screening → Notion → interview invite
Team access configured with appropriate permissions (HR full, managers edit, interviewers comment)
Documentation and training completed
key_activities: Design Notion database structure with 35+ properties
Configure status pipeline (9 stages) and automation
Create 7+ database views (Board, Table, Calendar, Gallery, List, High Priority, By Position)
Design candidate card template
Build Typeform application form with branding
Create n8n workflow: Typeform → Notion
Integrate CV screening workflow with Notion
Setup interview scheduling (Google Calendar or Calendly)
Configure calendar event creation with video links
Test complete pipeline end-to-end

team_allocation.Evgeniya_process: 4-5 hours (Notion database design, views, templates, Typeform design, testing)

risks.risk: Notion API rate limits with high application volume
risks.mitigation: Add delays in n8n workflow, batch process applications, monitor API usage
Implement deduplication logic in n8n (search by email before creating)

risks.risk: Team resistance to new ATS system
risks.mitigation: Involve team in design, provide training, emphasize time savings, allow feedback period

phases.phase_description: Automate job description creation, interview preparation, and LinkedIn job posting using AI content generation. Streamline communication and reduce time spent on writing and posting.
phases.output: AI-powered content generation for job postings, interview materials, and LinkedIn automation. Job posting creation time reduced from 1 hour to 30 minutes.
success_criteria: ChatGPT/Claude prompt library created for HR content (10+ prompts)
Job description generation tested with 10 examples - quality validated
NotebookLM workflow operational for interview prep materials
LinkedIn automation configured (Pabbly or Make.com)
Test job post: Google Sheets → AI generation → LinkedIn published successfully
Content quality meets brand standards (manual review confirms)
Time savings measured: 30 minutes per job posting vs 1 hour manual
Team trained on using AI tools effectively
key_activities: Create prompt library: job descriptions, interview questions, communication templates
Test ChatGPT/Claude for job description generation (10 samples)
Setup NotebookLM for interview prep from candidate CVs
Configure Pabbly or Make.com account
Create Google Sheets template for LinkedIn job data
Setup AI content generation for LinkedIn posts
Connect LinkedIn API for auto-publishing
Build workflow: Sheets → AI → LinkedIn
Test end-to-end: job posting data → LinkedIn published
Optimize AI prompts based on output quality

team_allocation.Viktoriia_technical: 3-4 hours (Pabbly/Make.com setup, LinkedIn API, workflow integration)
team_allocation.Evgeniya_process: 3-4 hours (prompt engineering, content testing, brand voice validation)

risks.risk: AI-generated content doesn't match brand voice
risks.mitigation: Iterate on prompts with examples, add manual review step, provide style guidelines to AI
Follow official documentation carefully, test with drafts first, have manual posting fallback
Use AI for first draft, always review and personalize, maintain human touch

phases.phase_description: Add compliance tracking layer, measure ROI, optimize workflows based on usage data, complete comprehensive documentation, and conduct team training. Finalize automated onboarding workflow.
phases.output: Fully documented, compliant, optimized HR automation system ready for ongoing use. Team trained, ROI measured, continuous improvement plan established.
success_criteria: Compliance audit completed for GDPR requirements
Automated compliance checks configured (data retention, consent tracking, audit logs)
Onboarding automation operational (welcome emails, folder creation, IT requests)
ROI measured and documented: 20-30 hours/month saved confirmed
Complete documentation in Notion playbook: all workflows, troubleshooting, best practices
Team training completed: all members can operate systems independently
Feedback survey created for continuous improvement
Optimization recommendations implemented (error reduction, performance tuning)
key_activities: Audit HR processes for GDPR compliance gaps
Setup automated compliance checks (certifications, document expiry, data retention)
Build onboarding automation workflow (welcome email, Google Drive folder, IT request)
Configure preboarding reminders (Day -3, Day -1)
Measure actual time saved in each process vs estimates
Create comprehensive Notion playbook with all documentation
Conduct team training sessions (2 hours total)
Setup feedback survey for process improvements
Implement monitoring and alerting for workflow failures
Optimize workflows based on Week 1-3 learnings

team_allocation.Viktoriia_technical: 4-5 hours (compliance automation, onboarding workflow, monitoring setup)
team_allocation.Evgeniya_process: 4-5 hours (documentation creation, team training, ROI measurement, process optimization)

risks.risk: Compliance gaps discovered late in implementation
risks.mitigation: Involve legal/compliance from Week 1, document data processing, maintain audit trails

risks.risk: Team not fully adopting new systems
risks.mitigation: Ongoing support, weekly check-ins, address concerns quickly, celebrate wins
Track metrics weekly, optimize inefficient steps, realistic expectation setting

milestones.description: Automated CV screening system processing 50 CVs in 90 minutes with >90% accuracy, fully tested and documented.
deliverables: n8n workflow: Gmail → Gemini AI → Google Sheets
CV Parser v1.1 optimized prompt
Google Sheets candidate database with 21 fields
Test results: 50 CVs processed successfully
Accuracy validation report (>90% confirmed)
Workflow documentation and user guide

quantitative: Processing time: 90 minutes for 50 CVs (vs 20+ hours manual) = 18.5 hour savings
Screening accuracy: >90% agreement with manual HR review
qualitative: Workflow reliability: zero critical errors in 50-CV test batch
Team confidence: HR team can operate workflow independently
Quality: AI scores align with HR hiring standards

milestones.description: End-to-end recruitment tracking from application to interview scheduling, all automated and integrated.
deliverables: Notion ATS database with 35+ fields and 7+ views
Typeform application form (branded, professional)
n8n workflow: Typeform → Notion → Email confirmations
Interview scheduling automation (Google Calendar or Calendly)
Integration: CV screening → Notion ATS
Test results: End-to-end candidate journey successful
Team training materials and documentation

quantitative: Application processing time: <5 minutes from submission to Notion entry (automated)
Interview scheduling time: 30 minutes → 5 minutes per interview (automated invite)
Recruitment cycle time: 30 days → 20 days average
Team collaboration: 70% reduction in email back-and-forth
qualitative: Candidate experience: positive feedback on application and scheduling process
Data centralization: all recruitment data in one place (Notion)
Team adoption: hiring managers actively using Notion ATS

milestones.description: AI-powered content generation for job postings, interview materials, and LinkedIn automation functional and tested.
deliverables: ChatGPT/Claude prompt library (10+ HR prompts)
Job description generation workflow (tested with 10 samples)
NotebookLM interview prep workflow
LinkedIn automation: Pabbly/Make.com → LinkedIn
Google Sheets template for job posting data
Test results: 3 job posts published to LinkedIn successfully
Content quality validation report

quantitative: Job posting creation time: 60 minutes → 30 minutes (AI-assisted)
LinkedIn post engagement: baseline established for future optimization
Content generation time: <10 minutes for first draft
qualitative: Content quality: meets brand standards (validated by HR manager)
LinkedIn presence: consistent, professional job posting cadence
Interview prep quality: interviewers find AI-generated materials helpful

milestones.milestone_name: System Fully Operational with Compliance & Documentation Complete
milestones.description: Complete HR automation system optimized, compliant, documented, and team fully trained. ROI validated.
deliverables: GDPR compliance audit report with all checks passed
Automated compliance monitoring (data retention, consent, audit logs)
Onboarding automation workflow operational
Complete Notion playbook (50+ pages of documentation)
Team training completed (all members certified on systems)
ROI measurement report: 20-30 hours/month savings confirmed
Continuous improvement feedback system
Workflow optimization recommendations implemented

quantitative: Total time savings: 20-30 hours/month measured and validated
Onboarding automation: 3-5 hours → 30 minutes per new hire
Error rate: <2% workflow failures with automated alerts
qualitative: Compliance: GDPR audit passed, all requirements met
Team competency: all members can operate and troubleshoot systems
Sustainability: system ready for ongoing use and scaling

task_sequence.task_name: Setup n8n Automation for CV Screening

dependencies: Task 3 - Notion ATS operational (trigger from hire status)

ascii_diagram: ├── Task 1: Setup n8n + Gmail + Gemini + Sheets (2-3h)
│   └── Output: CV screening automated (50 CVs in 90 min)
├── Task 3: Build Notion ATS + Typeform integration (2-3h)
└── Output: Job postings in 30 min vs 1 hour
└── Output: Complete system documented, 20-30 hrs/month saved
TOTAL: 4 weeks, 32-40 hours team time, €69-169/month cost

minimum_team: 1 HR Manager (Viktoriia) - Technical implementation lead (20-24 hours over 4 weeks)
1 HR Coordinator (Evgeniya) - Process design and documentation lead (12-16 hours over 4 weeks)
recommended_team: 1 IT support (optional, 2-4 hours for Google Workspace setup assistance)
1 Legal/Compliance reviewer (optional, 1-2 hours for GDPR sign-off)
human_resources.time_investment: 32-40 hours total team time over 4 weeks (8-10 hours per week)

software_required: n8n Cloud (EU datacenter) OR self-hosted n8n
Google Gemini API (free tier sufficient for start)
Google Workspace (existing - Gmail, Drive, Sheets, Calendar)
Pabbly Connect OR Make.com (optional for LinkedIn automation)
infrastructure: Modern web browser (Chrome recommended for n8n)
Google Drive storage (sufficient in free tier for most use cases)
EU-based server if self-hosting n8n (GDPR requirement)

financial_requirements.one_time_costs: €200-300 (primarily setup time value + first month tool subscriptions)
financial_requirements.monthly_recurring_minimum: €49 (n8n Cloud only, all other tools free tier)

high_risks.risk: Team resistance to AI-assisted hiring and automation
high_risks.mitigation: Involve team from day 1 in design decisions, emphasize time savings and career development opportunities from automation, provide comprehensive training, maintain transparency about AI limitations, allow human override in all decisions
high_risks.contingency: If resistance persists, implement more gradual rollout with manual review steps, collect feedback and adjust

high_risks.risk: GDPR compliance issues or data breach
high_risks.mitigation: Use EU datacenters for all tools (n8n Frankfurt/Amsterdam), obtain candidate consent before processing, document data processing activities, implement data retention policies (90-day auto-delete), maintain audit trails, involve legal team in review
high_risks.contingency: Immediate data processing halt, legal consultation, incident response plan activation, notification to data protection authority if required

medium_risks.risk: AI screening accuracy below acceptable threshold (<90%)
medium_risks.impact: High (could miss strong candidates or advance weak ones)
medium_risks.mitigation: Extensive prompt engineering with few-shot examples, calibration against manual HR review, bias testing across diverse candidates, continuous monitoring and tuning, fallback to manual review for low-confidence scores
medium_risks.contingency: Reduce AI role to pre-screening only, maintain manual review for final decisions, iterate on prompts until accuracy improves

medium_risks.risk: Tool integration failures or API changes breaking workflows
medium_risks.mitigation: Implement error handling and notifications in all n8n workflows, maintain backup manual processes documented, monitor tool changelogs, build modular workflows (easy to swap components), test regularly
medium_risks.contingency: Revert to manual processes, troubleshoot or rebuild broken integrations, consider alternative tools if API unstable

medium_risks.risk: Budget constraints lead to tool subscription cancellations
medium_risks.mitigation: Demonstrate ROI continuously (monthly time tracking reports), use free tiers where possible (Notion, Gemini, Typeform), self-host n8n if budget very tight, prioritize highest-ROI automations
medium_risks.contingency: Downgrade to minimum viable automation (n8n only, €49/month), focus on CV screening automation alone (highest ROI)

medium_risks.risk: Key technical person (Viktoriia) leaves during or after implementation
medium_risks.mitigation: Comprehensive documentation from day 1, cross-training (Evgeniya learns basics), video recordings of workflows, external support identified (n8n community, consultants), modular design for easier maintenance
medium_risks.contingency: Hire freelance n8n specialist for troubleshooting, simplify workflows to reduce complexity, rely on vendor support where available

low_risks.risk: Candidate experience degradation due to over-automation
low_risks.mitigation: Maintain human touchpoints at key stages, personalize automated communications, fast response times, transparent communication about process, collect candidate feedback
low_risks.contingency: Add more manual review steps, increase personalization, improve communication templates

low_risks.risk: Time savings projections not realized (actual <20 hours/month)
low_risks.impact: Low (still positive ROI, just less than expected)
low_risks.mitigation: Track time meticulously week-by-week, optimize inefficient workflows, set realistic expectations, focus on highest-ROI automations first
low_risks.contingency: Adjust projections, identify bottlenecks, additional optimization efforts, communicate realistic timeline for full benefits

optimization_tips: Start with CV screening only (Week 1) - validate ROI before investing in additional automations
Use free tiers extensively in first month to minimize risk before committing to paid subscriptions
Build workflows modularly - easier to troubleshoot, update, and swap tools if needed
Implement monitoring and alerting early - know when workflows break before candidates are affected
Track metrics from day 1 - time saved, costs, accuracy, candidate satisfaction - use data to optimize
Over-document during setup - future self will thank you, knowledge transfer easier
Test with small batches first - 10 CVs before 50, 1 job posting before 10, validate before scaling
Maintain manual process documentation - need fallback if automation fails
Schedule weekly check-ins during implementation - course-correct quickly, maintain momentum
Celebrate small wins - team morale matters, acknowledge progress after each milestone

for_smaller_teams_1_person.changes: Extend timeline to 6-8 weeks, focus on CV screening + Notion ATS only first, skip LinkedIn automation initially, simplify to essentials
for_smaller_teams_1_person.recommended_phases: Phase 1 (Week 1-2), Phase 2 (Week 3-4), Phase 4 simplified (Week 5-6), Phase 3 optional later

for_larger_teams_5plus_people.changes: Add role-based access controls in Notion, implement approval workflows, add team-specific views, consider enterprise tools
for_larger_teams_5plus_people.timeline: 4 weeks but with more parallel work
for_larger_teams_5plus_people.additional_considerations: More complex interview scheduling (multiple interviewers), department-specific workflows, reporting dashboards

for_non_EU_companies.changes: Can use US-based n8n datacenter, more tool options (Zapier without GDPR concerns), different compliance requirements
for_non_EU_companies.compliance_adjustments: Follow local data protection laws, adjust consent and retention policies accordingly

for_very_high_volume_hiring_500plus_CVs_.changes: Upgrade to paid Gemini API tier, consider dedicated server for n8n, implement batch processing, add quality monitoring
for_very_high_volume_hiring_500plus_CVs_.cost_adjustments: Budget €200-300/month for API usage, consider enterprise n8n license
for_very_high_volume_hiring_500plus_CVs_.scaling_considerations: Performance optimization critical, need redundancy and failover, monitoring essential

prerequisites: TASK-TEMPLATE-HR-001 (Create Job Posting - manual process before automating)
TASK-TEMPLATE-HR-002 (Search for Candidates - manual process to automate)
alternatives: TEMPLATE-PROJ-HR-001 (Complete Manual Recruitment Cycle - traditional approach)
TEMPLATE-PROJ-LG-001 (Lead Generation Automation - similar automation patterns)
follow_ups: Performance management automation (Phase 2 of HR automation)
Analytics dashboard creation for recruitment metrics
Advanced AI features (candidate matching, predictive hiring)

success_stories_and_validation.research_basis: Based on analysis of 77+ YouTube tutorials, case studies, and implementation guides published in last 60 days (as of Nov 2025)
validation_sources: Boomi Techie - n8n + Gemini CV screening tutorial (2.5 hours, Nov 2025)
The AI Doctor - 100% automated recruitment workflow tutorial (Nov 2025)
Jordan Pieces - Complete hiring system with Notion (Nov 2025)
ByteWise - CV screening & interview prep with NotebookLM (Nov 2025)
AIHR - AI in HR strategy and compliance frameworks (Nov 2025)
Pabbly - AI agent for LinkedIn job posts (Nov 2025)

expected_outcomes_based_on_research.cv_screening: 50 CVs in 90 min vs 20+ hours manual = 18.5 hour savings per batch

v1.0.changes: Initial Project Template creation based on HR videos research.md
v1.0.author: HR Automation Research Team
v1.0.validation: Based on 77+ tutorials and case studies from last 60 days

compliance_notes: GDPR compliance critical for Austria/Ukraine operations. All tools must use EU datacenters (n8n Frankfurt/Amsterdam required). Candidate consent required before processing CVs. Data retention: 90 days maximum for rejected candidates per GDPR Article 17. Audit trail maintained in n8n execution history and Notion change logs. Right to be forgotten: implement candidate data deletion workflow. Transparent communication: inform candidates about AI-assisted screening in job postings and application forms.
